篅篅篅

篅字的基本解释

篅
chuán
方言，一种盛粮食的圆囤。

篅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuán］
［《廣韻》市緣切，平仙，禪。］
［《廣韻》是爲切，平支，禪。］
一种盛谷物的圆形容器。

篅字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篅； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页892第12
【廣韻】【集韻】?是爲切，音垂。【廣韻】盛穀圓囤也。　又【廣韻】市緣切【集韻】【韻會】淳沿切【正韻】重圓切，?音遄。義同。　又【集韻】多官切，音端。竹名。出嶺南。　【集韻】亦作?。

篅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
篅字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhu
Basic explanation of words
Zhu
chuán
Dialect, a round store of grain.
Zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chuán]
["Guangyun" City Yuanqi, Pingxian, Zen. ]
["Guangyun" is for cutting, flat support, and Zen. ]
A round container for grains.
Zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　篅; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 892 No. 12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It is cut, the sound is down. [Guangyun] Shengguyuan is also stocked.　 [Guang Yun] City edge cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chun Yan cut [Zheng Yun] re-round cut,? Yin Dun. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Multi-official cut, sound end. Bamboo name. Out of Lingnan.　【Jiyun】also made?.
Zhu

Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics

Old glyph
Zhu
Name meaning
Nothing.
chuán
(1) 竹制圆形的谷仓 grain bin made of bamboo
(2) 又如: 篅囤(盛放谷物的仓廪) "圌"
(3) 另见chuí
